welcomePage.title: Welcome to the app!
welcomePage.description: This app offers more than just a collection of recipes - it is designed to be your very own digital cookbook. You can easily save and retrieve your own recipes at any time.

error.401: Wrong email or password. Try again!
error.409: A user with this email address or name is already registered. Please log in or enter a different email address
error.500: A connection error occurred. Please contact the support service
error.name: The name must contain only letters, spaces and dashes
error.email: Is not valid email. The email must be for example: email@example.com
error.password: Your password is weak. The password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one number

logout.confirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
logout.error: Something went wrong...Try reloading the page

editUser.success: You have successfully updated your details
editUser.error: Something went wrong...Try reloading the page

footer.info1: Database of recipes that can be replenished
footer.info2: Flexible search for desired and unwanted ingredients
footer.info3: Ability to add your own recipes with photos

subscribe.title: Subscribe to our Newsletter
subscribe.description: Subscribe up to our newsletter. Be in touch with latest news and special offers, etc.

mainHero.error: You didn't enter anything to search
mainHero.description: 'What to cook?' is not only a recipe app, it is, in fact, your cookbook. You can add your own recipes to save them for the future.
